H0.text: What kind of bird is a guillemot. Waterfowl

H1.text: What kind of bird is a guillemot. Songbird

H2.text: What kind of bird is a guillemot. Game Bird

H3.text: What kind of bird is a guillemot. Seabird

A4.text: Guillemot is the common name for several species of seabird in the Alcidae or auk family, part of the order Charadriiformes.

A5.text: They form very dense colonies on cliffs during the reproductive season.
